Device Drivers

Collaboration diagram for Device Drivers:

Detailed Description

Hardware dependant device driver code.


Modules

 Serial
 AVR drivers for serial communication.
 Debug Device
 Debug output driver for ATmega On-Chip UART.
 Realtek RTL8019AS
 10 MBit NE2000 compatible controller.
 AT90CAN128 CAN device
 Driver for Atmel's internal Full CAN controller.
